ComicInfo.Summary:
The Giant of the Badlands!: Kid Colt encounters the insane grandson of Paul Bunyan, a giant who hates normal-sized people.
The Killers of Abilene!: Tex hunts the man who murdered a friend of his father.
Bushwhacker's Boomerang!: After Black Barstow's gang robs a bank, Kid Colt helps the townspeople capture them, since the town's sheriff is off trying to capture Kid Colt.
Fight or Crawl, Outlaw!: A fixed boxing match and a crooked preacher nearly take Kid Colt down.
Six-Gun Deadline!: An old acquaintance of Kid Colt's offers him the opportunity to help swindle a rancher out of his cattle, but the Kid sides with the rancher instead.
ComicInfo.Title: The Giant of the Badlands!; The Killers of Abilene!; Bushwhacker's Boomerang!; Fight or Crawl, Outlaw!; Six-Gun Deadline!
ComicInfo.Penciller: Mike Sekowsky,Pierce Rice,Russ Heath,Mike Sekowsky,Pierce Rice,Russ Heath
